0: the actual dining area is in need of remodeling the only good thing about it was the view
Room had some very minor repairs nededThe cabinet door hing broke and a ring cover for one of the sprinkle heads feel from the ceiling one morning
If the common areas on upper floors were updated I would give a much higher rating
Connected to the Gallery mall which really did not have much of a shopping selection to offer although the fourth floor was closed for renovations
Walking to the room we did see some water damage the carpet in the halls could stand upgrading
Maintenance came and knocked on my door at 830am to say that they needed to unclog my sink to fix the room next door
Overall the room was comfortable but decor was dated and the hotel could do with a makeover
Only suggestion would be to modernize the carpet and decor
But the property is very tired and in need of a facelift not nearly as nice as other Renaissance hotels that I have stayed in
They are redoing the bathrooms in the place
1: Many of the renovations are complete the new Club Lounge is very nice
The hotel has been recently redone and it is very upscale clean and comfortable
Great location and very nice updated comfortable rooms
Perfectly predictable Renaissance hotel with large newly renovated rooms and very comfortable beds
The guest rooms and common areas alike were updated clean and very welcoming
The room was very nice and newly renovated
